name: Pithaya ni Tungkung Langit
description: The untold crusade of Tungkung Langit unfolds! Journey as Tungkung Langit as you wander and discover clues on what is going on in the Creation. Play and meet your created deities, fill the world with more creations, battle the void of chaos, explore the world- the universe that you have created. “Lakbayin ang sansinukob.”.
